document.masterDocTitle: Taxonomy of Micronectidae (Heteroptera: Nepomorpha) from Vietnam, with descriptions of 11 new species

subSubSection.paragraph: (For an extensive synonymy list and nomenclatural discussion, see Tinerella 2008 .)

Vietnam : Quang Ninh , Hanoi , Ninh Binh , Nghe An , Ha Tinh , Quang Tri ( Wróblewski 1962 , 1967 ); first records for Quang Nam , Dong Nai . Other countries: widespread from the Middle East, through southern
